original: 《 出征 》　軍團編成，軍團長挑選最高官職，能帶最多部隊。　其餘武將，依據智力高者擔任軍師，輔佐參謀事務。
text: "Expedition" 　 legion formation, the legion commander selects the highest official position, can bring the most troops.　The rest of the generals, based on those with high intelligence, serve as military advisers and assist in staff affairs.
